channel.title: INtopBackup
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtopBackup, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: This High Arctic rhino may change what we know about ancient animal migrations
item.description: A 23-million-year-old rhinoceros fossil is reshaping scientists' understanding of mammal evolution.

item.title: 'New York Times' sues Pentagon over media restrictions
item.description: The Times accuses Pentagon chief Pete Hegseth of violating its constitutional rights with a press policy that, the paper says, deprives the public of ...

item.title: Announcing the NPR Student Podcast Challenge for 2026 — and a very special prize!
item.description: The annual contest for students in grades four through 12 is back for its eighth year — this time with a special prize for a podcast that marks the 25...

item.title: Trump attacks Somali immigrants. And, CDC to address vaccine schedule for kids
item.description: Trump is targeting Somalis with racist remarks ahead of expected immigration enforcement activity in Minnesota. And, a CDC advisory panel will revisit...

item.title: 'There's no 911 for us': inside America's elite urban search and rescue teams
item.description: America's urban search and rescue teams are facing financial and political pressure. But their work has never been more in-demand, as weather disaster...

item.title: Trump to host signing of peace deal between leaders of DR Congo and Rwanda
item.description: The US president hopes that a peace deal will pave the way for greater American investment in the resource-rich region.

item.title: Israel says Palestinian groups returned body of Thai hostage held in Gaza
item.description: The remains of agricultural worker Suthisak Rintalak were recovered by Hamas and Palestinian Islamic Jihad in northern Gaza.

item.title: CDC panel to vote on hepatitis B vaccine for newborns
item.description: The CDC's vaccine advisory panel meets Thursday and Friday to discuss recommendations for the hepatitis B vaccine and the schedule of childhood shots.

item.title: Former EU top diplomat Mogherini accused in fraud investigation
item.description: The inquiry centres on allegations of favouritism in EU funding for a training programme at a school headed by Federica Mogherini.

item.title: 10/30: CBS Morning News
item.description: Pres. Trump reduces China tariffs after "amazing meeting" with Xi Jinping; firefighters rescue dog from cliff in San Francisco.

item.title: Previously unseen images of Epstein's island released
item.description: The new images come as a deadline for the broader release of documents held by the US government looms.

item.title: Ukraine and US negotiators to meet in Florida after Moscow talks, White House says
item.description: US special envoy Steve Witkoff will meet senior Ukrainian negotiator, Rustem Umerov, for talks in Miami on Thursday.

item.title: EMILYs List endorses former Atlanta mayor in Georgia governor race
item.description: Democrats are looking to win back the governor's office after decades of GOP control.

item.title: Oklahoma teacher on leave after failing Bible-based essay on gender
item.description: An instructor has been placed on leave after a student complained that she received a failing grade on a paper that cited the Bible to assert that the...

item.title: Affordable Care Act premiums are set to spike. A new poll shows enrollees are already struggling

item.description: With her sister's murder long unsolved, a woman turns to TikTok pleading for leads. Can you help? "48 Hours" correspondent Erin Moriarty reports Satur...

item.title: Federal agents launch immigration crackdown in New Orleans
